It's packet loss. Happened to me for a while, tried a ton of possible solutions but the one that worked was the hextech repair tool. Recommend you try it out.

Connection Timeout errors are generally an indication that your client has disconnected from the servers. The reason you see **Connection Timeout** specifically is because the client hasn't received a response from the server in a specific amount of time, thus it "times out". An unstable connection is the most common cause of these errors and our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) addresses the most common solutions.

Let me know if you still have issues after working through the guide.
